sentences.en: A unanimous vote was taken to liquidate the company.
sentences.cn: 全体投票一致通过停业清理公司。

sentences.en: But that plan apart on Sunday, all but assuring that Lehman would be forced to liquidate.
sentences.cn: 但是这个方案在周日无疾而终,导致雷曼只能被迫停业.

sentences.en: By Wednesday it looked as if PWC [ PricewaterhouseCoopers , the administrators ] had found assets to liquidate.
sentences.cn: 到了周三, 管理员找到了可以变现的资产.

sentences.en: He was compelled to liquidate his securities.
sentences.cn: 他被迫将债券变换成现金.

sentences.en: In that moment of distraction, he could miss his last favorable opportunity to liquidate his position.
sentences.cn: 当他分心时, 他就错过了最后的平仓机会.

sentences.en: It is not too late to liquidate assets and move into precious metals, spreading out geographically.
sentences.cn: 现在亦不是太晚去卖出资产和将所得的资金转移至贵金属, 以及将资本分散在世界各地.

sentences.en: Pressure is also mounting on distributors to liquidate their holdings of quayside material.
sentences.cn: 经销商出清码头库存的压力也在持续攀升.

sentences.en: The court decided to help the company liquidate its chain debts.
sentences.cn: 法院决定帮助企业清理三角债.

sentences.en: The doctor delivers demand the bill of cost , sa Weiji cannot liquidate.
sentences.cn: 医生一次次送来催索诊费的帐单, 萨维奇都无法偿付.

sentences.en: The stock was sold to liquidate the loan.
sentences.cn: 股票被卖出以偿还贷款。

sentences.en: They have not hesitated in the past to liquidate their rivals.
sentences.cn: 过去他们曾毫不犹豫地铲除对手。

sentences.en: They're likely to hold big fire sales to liquidate their inventory.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会举行清仓大甩卖。

sentences.en: Trying to liquidate that balance sheet quickly could lead to panic across the financial system.
sentences.cn: 试图清算他的资产负债表将会很快在金融体系内蔓延恐慌情绪.

words.tran_cn: 液体的；清澈的；明亮的；易变的
清算人；公司资产清理人
流动性；流动资产；[金融] 偿债能力

trans.tran_en: to close a business or company and sell the things that belong to it, in order to pay its debts
